metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Baldur's MouthAfter Foundry destroyed, civilians come to deactivated SW.One of civilians dialogs
metadata.how_to_trigger: larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=89.665054;49.625427;-40.672653&camTarget=89.123558;49.013592;-41.249229ReCon `SetGlobalOsirisFlag GLO_Foundry_State_ControlCentreDestroyed`Wait for npc to appear and talk to this particular npc.

0.speaker: Flo Hurlburl
0.text: I'm going to keep an eye on this thing - just in case it decides to rise and shine.

1.speaker: Flo Hurlburl
1.text: I feel a lot safer now that I've seen that that thing can 'die' just like anything else.

2.speaker: Flo Hurlburl
2.text: Safety my arse. Look at them, they're killing machines. What if one of them malfunctions?

3.speaker: Flo Hurlburl
3.text: You know, I didn't walk around armed until these Watchers showed up. 'Protection' my eye.
